entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
